page.title: 09CHILWORTH VILLAGE, HANTS
page.content: CHILWORTH OLD VILLAGE IS LOCATED TO THE NORTH OF SOUTHAMPTON CITY WITHIN THE RURUAL_URBAN FRINGE.IT HAS RETAINED ITS RURAL CHARACTER WITH A NURSERY SCHOOL AND A FEW SMALL HOUSING PROJECTS BEING THE ONLY MODERN DEVELOPMENTS. THE VILLAGE CHURCH REMAINS A FOCAL POINT,WITH THE ORIGINAL HOUSES LOCATED IN CLOSE PROXIMITY TO THE CHURCH ALONG A NARROW ROUTE_WAY. SOME OF THESE ARE THATCHED, OTHERS HAVE SLATE ROOFS AND THEY ARE ALL OF OLD CONSTRUCTION. HOWEVER, WITHIN THIS AFFLUENT AREA THERE ARE SIGNS OF NEGLECT,PERHAPS ILLUSTRATING THE PRESENCE OF AN AGEING POORER COMMUNITY, THE ORIGINAL POPULATION, WHO ARE NOW BEING REPLACED BY THE WEALTHIER CITY COMMUTERS;A CHARACTERISTIC TREND OF THE RURAL_ URBAN FRINGE.
